title: Science Education Design Using Infographics: ADDIE Model-Based Short-Term Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and proficiency in fundamental digital tools
context.additional_context: Learner role: students/job seekers, domain expertise: advanced, assessment method: formative assessment-focused, technology environment: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device)

learning_goals: The science-themed infographic design process can be explained by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation).
An optimized combination of text, images, and graphs can be designed for the visual delivery of scientific concepts.
A science infographic prototype can be created with a small team using online collaboration tools.

resources: Open-source image database for science education

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
